No. 24

Hana & Matei, Lombok Wedding

Lombok, Indonesia

lifestyle

Welcome to my dear friends wedding, held on the beautiful island of Lombok, Indonesia. They wanted a slight vintage/film feel to their images. it was a challenge shooting in full sun (literally not a cloud in the sky) but we pulled it off and they were in love with their photos.
